p: In total, we interviewed 64 people from 13 localities: eight in Xishuangbanna and three in Phongsaly. We obtained responses from a total of 64 interviewees from Xishuangbanna Dai Autonomous Prefecture, southwest China, and Phongsaly Province, Laos. The 64 respondents fell into three age groups: (1) 20–39, (2) 40–59, and (3) ≥ 60 years old, with an average age of 58.6 years. Most respondents (53%) were aged above 60 years, 36% were between 40 and 59 years old, and 11% were between 20 and 39 years old. There were 32 (50%) female respondents and 32 (50%) males. The occupation of the respondents included doctor, herbalist, witch, and village head (Additional file 1).
